mapper.select: SELECT p.*, c.name as category_name, u.username as seller_username, u.realname as seller_realname, u.phone as seller_phone, u.company_name as seller_company_name FROM product p LEFT JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN user u ON p.seller_id = u.id WHERE p.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (name, category_id, seller_id, price, unit, stock, brand, model, specifications, description, main_image, images, status) VALUES (#{name}, #{categoryId}, #{sellerId}, #{price}, #{unit}, #{stock}, #{brand}, #{model}, #{specifications}, #{description}, #{mainImage}, #{images}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE product SET views = views + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
